name: Hardest "Supergirl" Season 2 Episode 16 Trivia Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What type of movie did Mon-El suggest they watch?
questions.explanation:
Musical.

	Specifically he asked for a movie where someone randomly breaks into song. It was Kara who told him that was called a musical. He also mentioned a "Rom Com" but not to watch, only to talk about them. While having the TV on, aliens took over the broadcast and demanded the "release" of Mon-El.

questions.text: What building did Winn break into?
questions.explanation:
Art museum.

	He was on a date with his alien girlfriend. She took him to the side entrance of the museum and broke the lock off of the security box. Winn then rewired the security so they could go inside.

questions.text: The alien invaders were Mon-El's brother and sister.
questions.explanation:
False.

	It was actually his parents. Supergirl went with him to the ship at the last moment. That's when she found out he was actually a prince, and not a palace guard like he had claimed to be when they met. His parents were played by Kevin Sorbo (from "Hercules: The Legendary Journeys") and Teri Hatcher (From "Lois & Clark: The New Adventures of Superman").

questions.text: What food was Winn eating while being questioned by Maggie about a break-in at a local building?
questions.explanation:
Donuts.

	Winn said he was "stress eating". Maggie was asking him about the Vincent Van Gogh painting that was stolen from the museum the night before. It was Starry Night, my own personal favorite painting from the artist.  Lyra didn't appear on the security footage though, making Winn look like the thief.

questions.correct: Fragments from Krypton's explosion struck the planet.
options: He was saved by a ship from Krypton.
A palace guard put him on a ship headed for Earth.
questions.explanation:
Fragments from Krypton's explosion struck the planet.

	Mon-El recounted to his parents how he managed to get off the planet as it was being destroyed. It revealed that he left behind a few key people, and helped to kill a man from Krypton and steal his ship.

questions.text: What did the man who had information in Lyra want in exchange for telling Alex where she was?
questions.explanation:
Hamilton tickets.

	She slammed him into a pool table several times before hinting that he had the information they wanted. He asked for Hamilton tickets and then told them where Lyra's clan stayed. Alex told Winn that she could get the tickets because one of the actors owed her a favor.

questions.text: Who broke Lyra out of the DEO prison?
questions.explanation:
Winn.

	Winn believed her story that she set him up only because an alien crime syndicate was threatening to kill her brother. He stole the painting, freed her from the jail cell and went with her to make the trade. The painting they traded was a fake, James was with them to help save the day, but the alien criminal was too much for him. James managed to hold them off long enough for several DEO agents, including Alex, to arrive.

questions.text: Lyra's brother was rescued from the gang.
questions.explanation:
True.

	After the DEO agents showed up the gang was thwarted. There was a brief scene where Lyra and Winn made up and then he told to the "go get him", meaning her brother. The brother was safe and only a few feet away by that point.

questions.text: What crime was Winn charged with?
questions.explanation:
Nothing.

	Maggie let Winn go after he recovered the painting and helped to catch the criminal gang. She also agreed not to charge Lyra since she was acting under duress.

questions.text: Where did Mon-El end up at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation:
On Earth.

	His parents wanted him to return to Daxam with them to help rebuild the planet. They thought they needed a younger generation to inspire hope in their people.   Mon-El wanted to stay on Earth with Kara. After they spoke, he tried to make up to her for lying. He said he wanted to be a hero and stay with her. She told him it was over and made him leave the apartment. He then also had a fight with his parents, told them he was done being their prince and decided to stay near Kara on Earth.
